titles.title: TRADE SAFE Act
Timely Rejection of Adversarial and Dangerous Enterprises and Securing American Financial Exchanges Act
TRADE SAFE Act
A bill to amend the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 to prohibit national securities exchanges from listing securities issued by certain entities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
